prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If candidates are provided, you MUST choose one of them (even if it slightly overshoots quantity) and justify the pick—never return null when at least one candidate exists.
        Only when no candidates are supplied may you set `selected_product_id` to null, and those notes must begin with `MISSING_SKU:` so the pipeline can flag the meal for removal.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json

    ],

    ],

    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighFiber"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Chermoula Tilapia with Tomato-Olive Brown Rice",
  "description": "Baked tilapia in bright chermoula served over spiced brown basmati rice with tomatoes and olives, plus quick green beans on the side.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 200°C (390°F).",
    "Rinse 1.5 cups brown basmati rice until water runs clear; drain well.",
    "Finely chop 1 medium onion.",
    "Dice 3 medium tomatoes.",
    "Roughly chop 1/2 cup olives.",
    "Mince 2 cloves garlic.",
    "Trim 300 g green beans.",
    "Chop a small handful of parsley.",
    "Pat dry 4 tilapia fillets; season both sides lightly with salt and black pepper.",
    "Zest then halve 1 lemon."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Start rice: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a medium pot over medium heat. Add chopped onion and cook 3–4 minutes until translucent.",
    "Stir in 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon paprika for 30 seconds. Add rinsed rice and toast 1 minute.",
    "Pour in 3 cups vegetable stock and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce to low, cover, and simmer 30–35 minutes until tender.",
    "Bake fish: In a small bowl, mix 2 tablespoons chermoula with 1 tablespoon olive oil and the juice of half the lemon. Brush over tilapia on a lined tray. Bake 10–12 minutes until the fish flakes easily.",
    "Green beans: While fish bakes, heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a skillet over medium-high. Add green beans and a pinch of salt; cook 4–5 minutes until crisp-tender, tossing once. Add half the minced garlic in the last 30 seconds; toss and remove from heat.",
    "Finish rice: In the last 5 minutes of rice cooking, fold in diced tomatoes and chopped olives. Cover to warm through.",
    "Fluff rice with a fork. Stir in lemon zest and chopped parsley; adjust salt and black pepper to taste.",
    "Serve rice in bowls, top with baked tilapia. Spoon any tray juices over the fish. Serve green beans on the side with remaining lemon wedges."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "tilapia",
      "quantity": "4 fillets (600–800 g)",
      "preparation": "patted dry"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chermoula",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "mixed with oil and lemon for brushing"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "3 tablespoons total",
      "preparation": "divided for rice, fish, and beans"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zested and halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "2 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cumin",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "for rice"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "paprika",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "for rice"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "1/2 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "to taste, divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "to taste, divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomatoes",
      "quantity": "3 medium",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olives",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onions",
      "quantity": "1 medium",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "brown basmati rice",
      "quantity": "1.5 cups",
      "preparation": "rinsed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "vegetable stock",
      "quantity": "3 cups",
      "preparation": "hot or room temperature"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "green beans",
      "quantity": "300 g",
      "preparation": "trimmed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parsley",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "MiddleEastern",
      "NorthAfrican"
    ],

      "30to60"

}
        ```
